department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Supervised Reading
course.faculty_text: Gonzalo Giribet and members of the Department
course.description: Supervised reading on topics not covered by regular courses. For OEB concentrators, work may be supervised by faculty in other departments, provided it is co-sponsored by an OEB faculty member. For non-concentrators, work must be directed by an OEB faculty member. Students must submit a registration request to the OEB Undergraduate Office before enrollment. Students cannot take OEB 91r and 99r simultaneously with the same director.
